sentences.sContent: Sometimes going over the top is good, if you can let yourself go from time to time, people will notice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sometimes going over the top is good, if you can let yourself go from time to time, people will notice.
sentences.sCn: 有时挣脱束缚是好的，如果你能够让自己一次又一次地挣脱束缚，人们会注意到你的。
